title: Best way to get around Bangkok!
review: Sit above the Bangkok traffic in an airconditioned train that stops near most of the major city attractions  perfect If making more than a couple of stops get the all day pass for convenience

result.opinion: Perfect if making more than a couple of stops get the all day pass for convenience

title: Getting around Bangkok
review: This and the MRT are the only transport methods that guarantee arrival time at your destination and now with extensive coverage around Bangkok this has become a great city to visit

result.opinion: This and the MRT are the only transport methods that guarantee arrival time at your destination
This and the MRT are the only transport methods that guarantee arrival time

title: efficient
review: regular service clean & safe this means of transport to get around Bangkok has become the best way to compute between shopping centres restaurants theatres and most points of interest

result.opinion: Clean & safe
Regular service clean & safe

title: train on ...sky !!
review: You are feeling the air and you areon the skyyou see the rooms of buildings and then you feel fear and chaos of what the hell they have made

result.opinion: Feeling fear and chaos about the buildings
The review does not provide any opinion on staff quality.

title: excellent
review: excellent way to travel about Bangkok and we got a pass that we could top up anytime we came back to Bangkok Each trip is about 20 baht

result.opinion: Excellent way to travel about Bangkok

title: Very convenient and well connected
review: Definitely the only way to travel in bangkok at least on weekdays unless you actually LIKE sitting in a traffic jam for hours

title: Great mode of transport
review: what a great way to travel cheap clean quick   as tourists we found it simple and easy to use  was not nice to see disabled  infirm beggars at the station but i suppose that is common at any tourist transpost interchange

result.opinion: The station was clean.
Found it simple and easy to use

title: Quick, cool, efficient
review: Great way to get around Bangkok Cheap clean easy and the air con is fab This is a good alternative and extra to the subway trains Both are equally cheap and efficient

result.opinion: Great way to get around Bangkok
Clean

title: Not your usual Thai train...
review: since I am claustrophobic I'd often rather travel by bus or train than by underground whether in London or Bangkok having a nice clear view of the way ahead is a no brainer against the feeling of being buried alive I really loved the spectacular sights of the city displayed from the extralarge windows of the train And it really gets you to the other side of town in a flash One word of advise even if outside it's 35 degrees or more do bring along a shrug or scarf or similar because with air conditioning blowing air not over 20 degrees on your neck chances are you're gonna need it Enjoy the trip

title: Safe as houses.
review: A must for travellers  tourists to get around Bangkok  Very safe and efficient way of getting from the airport Very very clean also

result.opinion: Very safe and efficient way of getting from the airport
Very very clean

title: Travelling in Bangkok
review: Very easy to use and get around you can get to most of the landmarks by using the BTS it's not expensive either

result.opinion: Very easy to use and get around

title: Needs a Coin Vending Machine
review: Skytrains are suppose to be a more convenient way to travel  Thus having to line up just to change a note to coins to buy a ticket from the vending machine is just a little inconvenient  I personally feel you either start accepting notes on the ticket vending machine or have a vending machine that dispenses coins

result.opinion: Having to line up to change notes to coins for the ticket vending machine is inconvenient.

title: Primary form of transport !
review: This is efficient fast and goes most places on the visitor circuit  though can be a little expensive for families unless you buy a day ticket  no children's fares

result.opinion: Efficient, fast, goes to most places on the visitor circuit.

title: Fast clean and on time!
review: Coming from melbourne where the trains are continually late and station and toilets not up to standard we thought Bangkoks train system was great Easy to use ticket dispenser once you get the hang of it not a long wait wherever we went clean and air conditioned

result.opinion: The Bangkok train system is clean and air-conditioned.
Easy to use, clean, and air conditioned

title: Simply Fantastic Transport
review: If you want to get around Bangkok easily and quickly above the chokedcongested road transport you cannot beat the Skytrain  Get a map and see exactly where the many stations are being limited to a NorthSouth line and an EastWest line but with both lines being further extended   Cost is reasonable  maximum from one extremity of Bangkok to the other is 52 Baht ($2) but shorter distances much less   Easy system to understand dual language signage throughout really clean and efficient public transport   Great way to get to Weekend Market at the Northern line extremity

result.opinion: Easy system to understand, dual language signage throughout, really clean and efficient public transport.

title: Easy
review: For any visitor to BKK the sky train is just terrific it can take you to many of the places you want to reach in Bangkok without the hassle of the infamous traffic jams even beats the TUKTUK train is easy to use and runs very regularly if you miss a train wait around 6 or 7  mins for the next one

result.opinion: Terrific, easy to use, runs very regularly

title: great way to see Bangkok
review: very organized train system and a great way to see the city for cheap I basically only rode the skytrain or metro I also would also use the skytrain to get to and from both airports I just wish the skytrain opened earlier sometimes

result.opinion: Very organized train system and a great way to see the city for cheap

title: Very convenient
review: Very convenient way to get around Clean and airconditioned trains but very full during rush hours

result.opinion: Clean and airconditioned trains
Very convenient way to get around

title: Clean and efficient
review: This is by far the best way to move around Bangkok The train is cheap super clean and very fast There's stations in the most interesting places to visit (excepting the temples area)   Purchase a 1day or 3day pass if you're using it a lot it will save you money

result.opinion: Super clean
This is by far the best way to move around Bangkok

title: Ease of travel
review: My wife and I found it very easy to use the skytrain to get around Bangkok and the various shops and meet up with friend staying in another hotel   Would highly recommend  Only negative being the numerous stairs

result.opinion: Easy to use, highly recommend
Found it very easy to use

title: poor service! the counter receptionist seems like not willing to explain much with traveller. impatient!
review: impatient services ever counter receptionists are very poor attitude to customers we have to get the way ourselves or else if there is security guard there then the guard will help us

result.opinion: Security guard helps customers
Impatient services, very poor attitude to customers

title: Effecient Service
review: The train service was efficient and the air conditioning in the trains was a welcome refuge from the high temperature and humidity in downtown Bangkok

title: A  Best way to get around the city
review: Great for getting around townBest way to avoid he famous Bangkok traffic jamPrices are  low and informative staffs

result.opinion: Great for getting around town Best way to avoid he famous Bangkok traffic jamPrices are low Informative staffs

title: Simply the best way to get around downtown
review: Avoid the Bangkok roads and glide in airconditioned comfort Perfect for me to get between various destinations in the downtown area It does get VERY busy during peak hour so keep that in mind

result.opinion: Perfect for me to get between various destinations in the downtown area
Avoid the Bangkok roads and glide in airconditioned comfort

title: Modern - a great intro to the city as one comes from the airport!
review: Modern world class transport which the city can be proud of  What a pity that the ripoffs working in the city's taxi system let the rest of the city down

result.opinion: What a pity that the ripoffs working in the city's taxi system let the rest of the city down

title: Avoid at peak hour if you can
review: If you are a single traveler its a bargain Clean and regular service For a family of 4 taxis are cheaper Avoid during peak hours as it is sardine city  Good news is that Thai's are clean and have no body odour so although crowded its not sickening like the London underground

result.opinion: Clean and regular service

title: The only way to commute.
review: Sometimes governments so awfully wrong with public transit systems In Bangkok they did great Superbly connected reasonably priced rather comfortable and scenic And then there's the fact that you're bypassing some fairly gnarly traffic

result.opinion: Superbly connected, reasonably priced, rather comfortable and scenic

title: good but a bit costly
review: As compare to other country i found it to be a bit costly It is really life saver specially in the evening as there is hell lot of traffic and you can easily travel without any problem

result.opinion: Life saver in the evening due to traffic
It is a life saver specially in the evening as there is hell lot of traffic and you can easily travel without any problem

title: Very clean and easy to use
review: The best way to get around if it is daytime  You need to have the exact change or the Attendent can change out money for you  If you are going very far or making multiple trips you can buy a day pass for not much more  We found that taxis at night were easier and cheap  You can take the sky train down to the free ferry which is nice

title: Superb Way To Avoid Traffic Congestion
review: As always an inexpoensive simple safe and concenient way to get around the city  If I have the chance I never use anything else

result.opinion: Convenient and simple
Safe and convenient

title: Fantastic, convenient and inexpensive way to get around the city!!!
review: I love this train It's clean fast airconditioned and cheap The only thing not enough change machinesattendants to make change Take coins

result.opinion: Love this train It's clean
Loves the convenience of the train being clean, fast, air-conditioned, and cheap.

title: Convenience means of transport in Bangkok
review: At first I used a Limo from Airport to the hotel traffic gets horrible sometimesand I got into one of this traffics  A 1 hour drive became 3hrs and that was a good lesson as from then I asked about alternative means of transport and BTS skytrain became handy it will take you to many of the places in bangkok it si very clean with working air condition there is one after every 5 minutes so you dont stay waiting for too long On my way back i used BTS skytrain from my hotel to the airportthere is no traffic jams with BTS skytrain and hence more convenient way if you want to get somewhere on time  It is cheaper too it costed me 69BHT (2$) for the same distance which costed 1200BHT (39$) with a limo   Taxi use taximeters the drivers are so naughty they will take long route unnecessarily and or go at a lower speed just to make you pay more  I recommend BTS Skytrain as your convenientsafe and cheap means of transportation while in bangkok

result.opinion: BTS Skytrain is convenient, safe and cheap.
BTS Skytrain is convenient, safe and cheap

title: Great stuff
review: Very secure and security on station Staffs are friendly and given map direction  I used a lot of Nana station Some stations they provide the escalators and lift for handicap

result.opinion: Very secure and security on station Staffs are friendly and given map direction  I used a lot of Nana station Some stations they provide the escalators and lift for handicap
Friendly and helpful staff

title: BTS
review: I love the fact that the BTS skytrain is linked to many hotels and shopping malls  I didn't like the sound quality at the skytrain you can hardly hear the train driver when announcing the location were you are

result.opinion: Love the fact that the BTS skytrain is linked to many hotels and shopping malls

title: Probably the cleanest public transportation
review: Probably the cleanest public transportation Always on time Safe and fast Friendly people and you can get a seat most of the time Prices are astonishingly low

result.opinion: Safe and fast
Probably the cleanest public transportation

title: Convenient and inexpensive
review: Once you get past the whole crowding in the train thing this is a very efficient way to get around Living in Saigon means one is part of the motorbike culture as it's really the only way to get around This was a great way to shirk driving and parking responsibilities  The drawback is that it stops running long before you do

title: Great transportation system
review: Easy to use and navigate and an allday pass is only 140 bhat well worth it And probably safer than the tuktuks

result.opinion: Easy to use and navigate and an allday pass is only 140 bhat well worth it
Probably safer than the tuktuks

title: Average Speed
review: Far more better Compare to Kuala Lumpur Trains Packed but clean we traveled just short distance So nothing much i can say

result.opinion: Packed but clean

title: So clean!
review: Their train system is so easy to navigate I'm from New York and am used to taking the subway so I was glad that I experienced taking the trains in Bangkok There's always someone to assist touriststravelers if any problem occurs

result.opinion: Easy to navigate, someone to assist tourists if problems occur
Glad that I experienced taking the trains in Bangkok

title: Handy!
review: I used this system many times in Bangkok It is easy efficient clean and interesting as you get to see the sights in the city

result.opinion: The system is clean.

title: Easy and fast travel without getting stuck in traffic.
review: Easiest way to travel between the hot spots of central Bangkok Some stations are within reach if the MRT(subway) Two different companies so fares are different Try to avoid when all locals are going home though Tight as a sardine can

result.opinion: Easiest way to travel between the hot spots of central Bangkok
Easiest way to travel between the hot spots of central Bangkok

title: DANGER!
review: I so enjoy trains To begin with they´re long clean and filled with beautiful Thai people What else can you ask for Also if you stay at the far back of the BTS you will get a free dinner with red wine just sit at the seats way way in the back of the train and say Yes if someone accosts you in Thai  Many years ago the BTS was emptier but now everybody seems to have money in Bangkok and it´s much more difficult to have peace in the BTS Why does the city council not stop this Also the tuktuk drivers can´t compete with the SPEED of the trains why should they be left behind Modernity just keeps on leaving everything behind i can´t stand it Let´s do something about it  don´t use the BTSsystem

result.opinion: Enjoys the cleanliness of the trains.

title: Clean & Efficient Transportation
review: Best way to get around the city efficiently and to the airport Highly recommend trying it out during your stay in Bangkok Great way to jet around the city at night if you want to do dinner and drinks in different areas of the city Very cheap VERY CLEAN and efficient

result.opinion: VERY CLEAN

title: Airport transferes
review: Easy to use and cheap Comfortable and an easy option to travel in from the new airport Skytrain gives good coverage of the city

result.opinion: Easy to use and cheap Comfortable and an easy option to travel in from the new airport Skytrain gives good coverage of the city

title: excellent
review: Excellent transportation for hot season Good connection with River boats Piers and MRT Nice views of the city also)) PS Beware of strong air conditioner inside( I got a could((

result.opinion: Excellent transportation for hot season. Good connection with River boats Piers and MRT. Nice views of the city also. Beware of strong air conditioner inside (I got a cold).
Excellent transportation for hot season Good connection with River boats Piers and MRT Nice views of the city Beware of strong air conditioner inside

title: Easy rider
review: Great for getting around town just remember to have plenty of change as several of the ticket machines dont accept notes

result.opinion: Great for getting around town but inconvenient for not accepting notes at several ticket machines

title: Obvious transport choice
review: Convenient but lame that you cannot link to Metro rail system using one Rabbit card or get a free transfer between BTS and Metro Efficient and organized

result.opinion: Convenient but lame that you cannot link to Metro rail system using one Rabbit card or get a free transfer between BTS and Metro

title: Convenient transport
review: The BTS is always very clean and is a good alternative to travelling in a taxi and being stuck in traffic

result.opinion: The BTS is always very clean and is a good alternative to travelling in a taxi and being stuck in traffic
The BTS is always very clean

title: Great way to get around
review: What can you say about the sky train  it goes above the traffic so you can keep right on going while the cars below are stopped in traffic  Relatively inexpensive  Great way to get around Bangkok

result.opinion: Great way to get around Bangkok
Great way to get around Bangkok

title: Travel by Skytrain if convenient.
review: Great experience easy to use and cheap too Its certainly a break from the heat an humidity of the city

result.opinion: Easy to use and cheap

title: A great way to get around Bangkok
review: Clean fast and safe would best describe the sky Train Once you reach the platform you will be whisekd away in an air conditioned carriage with great view of the City Do avoid Major commuting times as it can get cramped in there but otherwise you can really see the City withouit being stuck in traffic Kudos to the Thais they are continuing to build more and more sky Train routes at an amazing Speed

result.opinion: Clean fast and safe
Clean fast and safe

title: Great way to get around
review: Once you have the system figured out this is a great way to get around In Thailand I generally find 95% of people friendly and helpful however this was not my experience on the Skytrain so be prepared When you arrive on the station there are people sitting behind windows but they do not dispense tickets they only give out change for the ticket machines It took a while to work out where I wanted to go and how to use the machine but once done it's easy

result.opinion: Not friendly or helpful staff
Took a while to work out where I wanted to go and how to use the machine

title: Great Transport
review: This is a very efficient way to travel around Bangkok and certainly faster than Taxi during the peak times

result.opinion: Very efficient way to travel around Bangkok

title: Fastest way to get around bangkok
review: If you're visiting Bangkok it is worth using the sky train You can get from one station to the next in under 4 mins   The fare is fairly cheap You pay according to the station you are traveling too 55bhat was the most  It is great to use at peak traffic times as Bangkok traffic is awful   The doors do open and close very quickly and do not wait for anyone as my friend found out So you must make sure you are ready to jump out  Much like the underground in London but with air con

result.opinion: The sky train is convenient.

title: Clean and easy to use
review: Need to have change  can queue for change but then need to queue to get tickets  All happens very quickly though

title: Useful
review: Really useful for getting around the city eg to the MBK mall and other parts of Bangkok good value

result.opinion: Really useful for getting around the city

title: It Was Efficient.
review: The Skytrain was clean and it helped me commute to several places in Bangkok The intervals between stations were okay but I felt that the interchange station was a bit of a distance A great tip If you're planning to come to Bangkok I'd recommend staying around Siam or a few stops away from Siam This will save you a lot of time travelling from one place to another I didn't take that into consideration while planning for my trip to Bangkok I ended up staying 11 stations away  from the interchange station and I lost so much time while travelling Well of course it also depends on where you would be travelling to If you're only going to travel around the place that you stay in I guess this tip doesn't apply to you

result.opinion: The Skytrain was clean

title: Convenient
review: Used the BTS Sky Train which is a lot quicker than getting round Bangkok by car Clean and efficient but can get extremely busy at times Cheap way to get around Bangkok although limited area covered

result.opinion: Clean and efficient
Quick, clean, and efficient.

title: Easiest way to get around in BKK
review: BTS Skytrain is very easy to use and also very reliable The cost is very reasonable as well Traffic in Bangkok is very bad and the BTS is the fastest way to get anywhere

result.opinion: BTS Skytrain is very easy to use and also very reliable
The cost is very reasonable
The review does not express an opinion about safety.

title: Cheap and efficient
review: Easy to get around air co and cheap  Announcements in Thai and English  Tip though is avoid rush hour as it is major sardine time

result.opinion: Easy to get around, air conditioning, and cheap.

title: great way to travel
review: cheap and easy although did have to ask someone if I was on right platform but had no trouble getting around and it's air conditioned

result.opinion: Cheap and easy

title: easiest way to get around the city
review: Found the Skytrain system just so easy to use  Sure sometimes I needed to take a bus to get to the Skytrain or a taxi once I arrived nearby my destination  A fun way to see the city from uphigh above the streets too

result.opinion: Found the Skytrain system just so easy to use
Found the Skytrain system just so easy to use

title: Unless you're traveling solo, overpriced!
review: Since our hotel is located just behind Chit Lom BTS we thought it would be worth a try  But unless your destination is located next to a BTS station (which would still mean walking out in the balmy weather) hail a taxi instead  gets you from point to point for a coupla baht more And that's just calculated for one couple If you are an even bigger group it's a complete nobrainer

title: Probably the fastest way to get around BKK
review: It does not cover some part of the city especially at the west area of Bangkok They are still extending the stations and some new station (hopefully) will finish by next year  Tips Buy a Rabbit card You will save a lot of time having to queue to buy the ticket for each ride You can also use this card at various restaurants such as McDonald and get a discount too Some station provide a lift for handicapped people Some don't Avoid the rush hour It could be HEAVILY packed during that time

result.opinion: Avoid the rush hour It could be HEAVILY packed during that time Buy a Rabbit card You will save a lot of time having to queue to buy the ticket for each ride You can also use this card at various restaurants such as McDonald and get a discount too Some station provide a lift for handicapped people Some don't

title: Nice and cold but packed!
review: It was great using this train because it was nice and cold however it seemed to be packed regardless of time of day Still it was the fastest way to get around the traffic logged city

title: convenient transportation
review: Family holiday here for 4 days  Very clean and easy take during non rush hours The BTS brought us to the chatuchak weekend market Sarthon pier silom paragon etc

result.opinion: Very clean

title: Fastest and cheapest way to zip zap across the Bangkok city
review: BTS skytrain is a fastest way to zip across the busy Bangkok city As a traveller tip ensure that your hotel is closer to  any of the BTS stations a lot of your city travel woes could be minimized  Like most Metro trains across the world BTS ticketing and train route maps are easy to follow for tourists as well The best part is that BTS has stops right Siam Ocean World Mall and MBK Mall two of the largest and best malls in the city

result.opinion: BTS skytrain is a fastest way to zip across the busy Bangkok city

title: amazing .. time saver
review: Its very fast  easy to ride available at most of the tourist spots If you want to avoid the hectic traffic of bangkok  it is the choice

result.opinion: Very fast, easy to ride, available at most of the tourist spots
It is a safe choice to avoid the hectic traffic of Bangkok.

title: Easy go!
review: Bangkok siam area always have traffic jam The BTS is one for the best way to use Of coz after shopping u would like to use it too

result.opinion: BTS is the best way to use after shopping.

title: Cheap , quick and locals friendly
review: Very fast and cheap way of moving around Bangkok All trains are airconditioned and travellers very helpful An hour ride in a taxi is approx 10 minutes maximum in a train

result.opinion: Very fast and cheap

title: Best way to get around BKK
review: Avoid the traffic  Buy a rabbit card to use so you don't have to stand in line  The Rabbit card cannot be used on the underground  By using a combination of the sky train the underground and the river express you can avoid the traffic to almost anywhere in BKK

result.opinion: Avoid the traffic  Buy a rabbit card to use so you don't have to stand in line
The review does not express an opinion about safety.

title: Skip the traffic and ride the BTS
review: Really convenient way of transport if you miss one train the next one is only 5mins away Trains are clean and airconditioned All of the major shopping malls and markets we wanted to visit were accessible via a Skytrain station

result.opinion: Really convenient way of transport

title: Loved the skytrain! fun, cheap, accurate timming, good views and has AC
review: Super fast and accurate timing and so cheap it´s an excellent idea to travel in the sky train not just because you get on time and it is really cheap but because it is an experience itself You can see the city from on top it has AC you avoid terrible traffic and people behave according to the place respectfully

title: So efficient
review: An easy way to get about Clean efficient on time and with English  for us western tourists So easy to navigate

result.opinion: Clean efficient

title: Interesting Experience
review: It's different to any other metro I've been to in the world It's much cleaner and more organised Trains are on time and so frequent But they are also so packed and cramped inside and any time of the day You will be touching elbows with a stranger and might even make a new friend )

result.opinion: It's much cleaner and more organised

title: It's a train folks, nothing new.
review: went from Siam Paragon Mall to Central Embassy mall Cost is 22 thai baht per person it's for short distance travel cheap and somewhat confusing got thai and english instructions routes on board could be confusing but manageable crowded but which train is not typically clean place has hidden elevators available hard to find so ask the security or train personal to help you only takes coins for tickets but they have live operators sitting to give you change however these live operators will not give you the ticket so you get change and go back to the machine to get the ticket the number you press on the machine is the cost of your tour in one direction once get the ticket go through the gate and keep the ticket as when you get off you will have to slide the same ticket again to get out of the gate if you loose it the security will escort you to the changes station and you will have to pay again so keep your tickets until the trip is competed and you are out of the station

title: Easy to use
review: It only takes just a few minutes to understand how the BTS Skytrain operates I would recommend having coins on hand to purchase your tickets although you can pay with bills Traveling by the Skytrain is fun and an easy way to get from one end of town to the other

result.opinion: Easy way to get from one end of town to the other

title: First transport
review: As you know bangkok is busy city  Not easy to go here to there because of traffics   Sky train is best transport system and first to travel  Like it a lot

result.opinion: Like it a lot that corresponded to aspect: Convenience

title: Easy transport
review: Cheap and convenient to travel around in BKK However you will always need to change coins at their control station

result.opinion: Convenient to travel around in BKK

title: BTS sky Train
review: very crowded confusing signboards not disable friendly expensive in short distance travel not enough ticket vending machines long queue to buy ticket not enough info to guide tourists who cannot understand Thai

result.opinion: Crowded, confusing signboards, not disable friendly, expensive in short distance travel, not enough ticket vending machines, long queue to buy ticket, not enough info to guide tourists who cannot understand Thai

title: It's good but it needs to develop more
review: It's quite fast and you can see some cool stuff but it's quite upsetting how few lines they have They really need to change that

result.opinion: It's quite upsetting how few lines they have.

title: convenient and economical
review: These trains are pretty much frequent and very economical The only problem is they do not have late night or early morning trains

result.opinion: Trains are frequent and economical but lack late night or early morning trains.

title: BREEZE THROUGH BANGKOK
review: The BTS in Bangkok is the fastest  safest  and the most comfortable way to travel within Bangkok  Dont bother looking for a cab  You will only crawl in traffic  no matter what time of the day or place it is Most places to visit are comfortably covered by the BTS network  And if youre staying long  get yourself a prepaid Rabbit card  You will avoid queues completely  which can be long at times  So  breeze through Bangkok on the BTS

result.opinion: The BTS in Bangkok is the safest way to travel.

title: Fast and efficient
review: Just outside our hotel with a walkway to it Used it everyday to get all over town It was a very convenient way to travel and also fast and efficient A cheap and very easy way to travel

result.opinion: Very convenient way to travel

title: Very convenient, crowded sometimes
review: There are 2 lines sukhumvit and silom that help you go around the East part of Bangkok easily There are also interchanges with the MRT and the Airport link The price is reasonable the one day ticket is just 130 baht and you can travel as many as you want The skytrain works until midnight Overall fantastic

result.opinion: Fantastic convenience

title: very convenient
review: neat  comfortable fast and keeps you away from bangkok's bad traffic  We used it for Shopping sightseeing etc

result.opinion: Comfortable, fast, keeps you away from traffic

title: Best city views
review: Best way to see the city from an elevated platform Yes it will be crowded but still enjoyable Buy a multi pass if you are staying for more than a week at least 15 trips then top up after that or if longer more trips as the best value

title: Fast, cheap, smooth and easy
review: to understand You get single use cards Map on wall shows numbers next to each stop Figure out where you are and then figure out where you want to go That number is the number of baht it costs to get there Press that number on the ticket machine and then put in your baht It will then give you a ticket If you have questions or need change (it doesn't take paper baht it only takes coins) go to the attendant behind the ticket counter Have fun

title: An excellent way to get from Bangkok's Suvarnabhumi Airport to downtown Bangkok
review: I took the BTS Skytrain from Bangkok's Suvarnabhumi Airport to the Nana BTS Skytrain station which is located in Sukhumvit Road and from there it was a fairly short walk to my hotel The terminal at the airport was easy to find I purchased a 'ticket' a plastic disc at the kiosk from a young lady who's English was excellent I did not have to wait long or the next train and as it is a terminus the carriages were all empty and so I had a seat I found the journey in to Bangkok interesting fast and very comfortable At the other terminus Phaya Thai BTS station I disembarked and bought another ticket for my eventual destination Nana BTS station The total cost was less than 100 Baht (£2) which is a lot cheaper than a taxi However that being said I do not recommend taking this journey if you have heavy or a lot of luggage or luggage and small children to look after too there are some distances to walk that include stairs and escalators

title: Best way to move around Bangkok
review: One of my favorite transportation method in Bangkok Have several connections with the MRT system Could be quite packed during afteroffice hours And also the queue is not as good as in Singapore But train is well maintained and stations are clean

result.opinion: Train is well maintained and stations are clean

title: Easy & best A/C in BKK!
review: Extremely easy to use Bring coins Look at Lingala to find the name & number of the stop you want to get off  At kiosk select that station number It will tell you the cost Pay and collect ticket for turnstile Keep as you need it for BTS exit  Great AC  As clean as possible given use level

result.opinion: Extremely easy to use
Extremely easy to use

title: Arterial System
review: The BTS is the artery or vein of the city Very much like the Singapore MRT system but very overcrowded We had to push ourselves in during the peak rush hours Smooth oiled machinery for economic developement I would say Take a spin in it for an experience

result.opinion: Very overcrowded
Very overcrowded during peak rush hours

title: Just great!
review: One of the most clean and safest transport system in the world Cant wait to see them extend the line

result.opinion: One of the most clean and safest transport system in the world
One of the most clean

title: The easy way to get around Bangkok
review: The Skytrain is a great cheap and airconditioned way to get around Bangkok  The ticket machines are easy enough to use (save your coins for them) as are the ticket barriers and the system generally  The only downside is that the Skytrain does nor extend to the main tourist locations

title: Best way to travel in Bangkok
review: The best way to get around Bangkok is by Sky Train It's cheap clean reliable and regular It's also far quicker cooler (AC) and more comfortable than travelling by tuk tuk Unfortunately it doesn't cover the area where the Grand Palace is situated or lot of the other ancient monuments are but between the river and most of the main shopping areas it's the only way to travel

title: The train traffic monitoring need to be resolved
review: The train traffic monitoring is bad Every months bangkokians experienced the maintenance and delay Also we never get a chance to sit on the chair Good thing is that it is clean and faster than taking a vehicles in bangkok

result.opinion: The train traffic monitoring is bad Every months bangkokians experienced the maintenance and delay Also we never get a chance to sit on the chair Good thing is that it is clean and faster than taking a vehicles in bangkok The train is not convenient
The train is clean.

title: Easy and cheap
review: We used this around the Sathon area  great for getting to the MBK area and to the Skybar our hotel (eastin grand) has a stop at it Much cheaper than using taxistuk tuks so definitely worth a trip on

result.opinion: Great for getting to the MBK area and to the Skybar

title: So easy to use.  and air con!!
review: Air conditioned carriages  and quick mode of transport very modern and efficient  Like all big cities it can get busy at peak times

result.opinion: Air conditioned carriages and quick mode of transport very modern and efficient

title: Why is this on tripadviser?
review: This is a great way to get from A to B  Every time I've caught a taxi in bkk we've had a 10 minute (minimum) traffic pause So I suppose if you are going somewhere that is enroute take the skytrain   but that's all I can say

result.opinion: Great way to get from A to B

title: faster & cheaper
review: the sky train is a faster and cheaper way to travel but the area of service is limited Most of the malls have direct access to the walk way to the station

result.opinion: The area of service is limited.

title: Convenient and comfortable
review: Very convenient  The trains are all with aircon so it's very comfortable during the hot sunny days  My kids also love to watching the trains come and go on the platform  Just one thing Some of the stations do not have escalators so it's a bit incovenient for families with strollers

result.opinion: Very convenient  The trains are all with aircon so it's very comfortable during the hot sunny days  My kids also love to watching the trains come and go on the platform  Just one thing Some of the stations do not have escalators so it's a bit incovenient for families with strollers

title: The way to move around in BKK
review: This is the best transport option to move around in Bangkok Most of the good places to visit are connected via the BTS network

title: Good transportation in Bangkok
review: I travel to work by BTS every weekdays It helps us save the time a lot but there are crowded would be nice to have more trains Sky train is expanding the lines right now but it will take a few years until its finished

result.opinion: Saves time but crowded, would be nice to have more trains.

title: Air conditioned - great!
review: Very clean and efficient  Which it would cover more of the city so you would not have to haggle with taxis all the time that go nowhere in the traffic

result.opinion: Very clean

title: Vacation
review: Easy bring change Long lines but they go quick Faster when there is a lot of traffic You pay the fee associated with the number of your stop

result.opinion: Easy bring change Long lines but they go quick Faster when there is a lot of traffic

title: By pass the traffic!
review: Love the BTS Much better mode of transportation in traffic prone Bangkok  It would be nice if they have more ticket machines at each station Often time we had to get in line to exchange bills for 10 bath coins and then get into another line for the ticket machine

result.opinion: Love the BTS, Much better mode of transportation in traffic prone Bangkok It would be nice if they have more ticket machines at each station Often time we had to get in line to exchange bills for 10 bath coins and then get into another line for the ticket machine

title: One day pass !
review: if u need to learn the route just grab the map it super easy to understand u only need a day  and if u using this a lot buy a one day pass this access only cost u 140bath but can take u everywhere until midnight

result.opinion: Super easy to understand, only need a day, buy a one day pass

title: Skytrain bangkok
review: Bangkok sky train is fun It's fast cheap way to get anywhere in Bangkok When I was staying in Bangkok my daily trip from Sala Daeng to Taksin pier would only take me no more than 1015 minutes Air conditioning is always on very spacious and wide trains best views of Bangkok through the window

result.opinion: Bangkok sky train is fun and fast

title: Public transporcie
review: Fab way to get around BKK fairly cheap highly efficient Only problem   freezing interior of trains

result.opinion: Highly efficient, fairly cheap

title: Value for money
review: You can get to most of the big shopping centres via the BTS Skytrain in Bangkok Use the skytrain to go to your hotel from the airport as well

result.opinion: The Skytrain is convenient for reaching major shopping centers and the hotel from the airport.
Accessibility is good, convenient

title: Take your hotel on the Skytrain Route and Save your precious time
review: The Skytrain is the best way to leave from airport There are a lot of good Hotels on the main Airport line Prefer to take those and you won't regret it The train has good connectivity to other places in Bangkok and the best mode to travel The city is usually full of traffic jams and the Skytrain can be a savior

result.opinion: The Skytrain is the best way to leave from the airport

title: Avoid rush-hour
review: Great bargain for transportation but it's very crowded at rush hour   Mornings are best  Pick up a BTS map for free anywhere   it's very straightforward and easy to use

title: Nice photo of an empty train...  rarely ever like that
review: Cheap safe efficient clean All large cities should have a transport system that operates as efficiently and effectively as this Can be a hassle to get a seat and when you're tired and hot you really want to sit down and watch some quirky Thai advertisements on the incarriage screens Nevertheless seat or not still absolutely the best way to travel through Bangkok

result.opinion: Safe and efficient
Cheap safe efficient clean

title: Super way to get around!
review: The BTS sky train is clean easy to use and you can get around Bangkok very quickly and very cheaplyalso means you do not have to sit in the heavy traffic We caught the BTS from the airport directly into Bangkok and it took about 25 mins opposed to at least 1 hour or more by car in the traffic

result.opinion: The BTS sky train is clean

title: Best way to get around the city
review: Best way to avoid the horrible traffic jam in BKK Whenever I visited BKK I'll find a hotel close by BTS station

result.opinion: Staying close to a BTS station for safety.
Convenience is important for avoiding traffic jams in Bangkok.

title: Give the taxi's a miss - use the BTS
review: We have visited Bangkok many times over the past 30 years  The traffic in Bangkok is crazy  Get a BTS map and use it for as much of your travel throughout the city as you can  Not only will you save money but you will save time  The trains are very clean and efficient

result.opinion: The trains are very clean and efficient

title: Sky train first timers...
review: The Skytrain is dead easy to use Basically it consists of 2 lines It is easy to navigate Buy a Carrot card like a London Oyster card It costs 200 baht which is about £4 We used it about 4 times then had to top it up A card also saves you from having to join long queues and fiddle about with loose change as the machines don't accept notes You can't eat or drink on the train

result.opinion: Dead easy to use, easy to navigate, saves you from long queues and fiddling with loose change.

title: Effective but limited
review: Hot platforms crowded trains limited destinations Although the carriages are air conditioned and it is a pretty cool way to see Bangkok you may be better off catching a taxi unless you are on a tight budget

title: crowded
review: convenient and close easy to use but very crowded cheap to use frequent stops but faster than a taxi and cheaper

result.opinion: Convenient and close

title: cheap & easy
review: If you're near the skytrain it is by far the easiest way to get around the city Cheap and very easy to use but does not go to all the touristy areas

result.opinion: Easy to get around the city, cheap and easy to use
Easy to get around the city, cheap and easy to use.

title: Fast and efficient
review: The sky train is a fast and efficient way of getting around town It is cheap too But I would not consider it a tourist attraction though it does beat traveling underground The only downside is at this stage the BTS does not connect to the old city

result.opinion: The sky train is a fast and efficient way of getting around town

title: Fast cheap transport
review: The sky train is very easy to use and the trains are a fast way of getting around Bangkok Tickets are cheap and we got a day pass so you can hop on or off as many times as you like where ever you like The sky train was very clean And we enjoyed looking out the window and selecting our next spot to get off Staff were very helpful

result.opinion: The sky train was very clean
Staff were very helpful

title: Convenient traffice
review: Very convenient way to look around Bangkok city There's many famous tourism spot  on the BTS line It's a good choice to avoid stuck in the traffic jam that commonly seen in Bangkok

result.opinion: Very convenient way to look around Bangkok city

title: Easy travel in Bangkok
review: The Skytrain is so easy and cheap to use  Just be aware of keeping your belongings close and zipped up and it's the safest and quickest way to travel around the city

result.opinion: Safest way to travel around the city
The Skytrain is so easy and cheap to use

title: Good but very Costly
review: The connectivity is not much but can take you to popular destinations directly The whole experience was good but felt that it is a bit expensive

result.opinion: The connectivity is not much but can take you to popular destinations directly.  The whole experience was good but felt that it is a bit expensive.

title: Fast
review: Easy fast convenient but sometime crowded during peak hour like 9am & 7pm at Thailand Hope it have direct connection to the Don Muaeng & other airport for tourist ease

result.opinion: Easy fast convenient

title: BTS Skytrain
review: First class Best way to get around Bangkok We used the skytrain every day to get to the tourist places Cheap as chips get a day rider for about 160 bht each and go all over the place

result.opinion: No opinion on staff quality is expressed in the review.
First class, best way to get around Bangkok

title: Cheap, fast, A/C & clean
review: The BTS sky was super nice  I lived in Bangkok as they were building the sky train 20 years ago  It was traffic jam to get anywhere with no possibility of relief during rush hour with the exception of a few canal boats  After my past experience of heavy traffic on slow busses & taxi’s through Bangkok the sky train was a dream come true  It had frequent pick up’s and it was so fast and relatively cheap compared to a taxi  The interior was really clean and nice and cool  It really is the way to go across Bangkok when your destination falls near a skytrain stop use the sky train  We rode the train from a mall down town to the Chatujak market and it was great

result.opinion: The interior was really clean and nice and cool

title: Fast and best transportation
review: I've been going by skytrain before in Bangkok and it was the natural choice for me this time also It's must faster than taxi and also cheap The only problem is that you can't go by skytrain to some places like Royal Palace and Khao San Road

result.opinion: Faster and cheaper than taxis

title: Surely up there with the best
review: A great way to get around the city and dirt cheap too Aircon and a tv in all carriages and the usual Thai eentry and exit technique So civilised

result.opinion: A great way to get around the city and dirt cheap too

title: Perfect way to get to Siam Square for shopping.
review: It's so easy to read the map and understand the cheap cost of travel to your destination All signs and announcements are in both Thai and English so there is no confusion Trains are fairly frequent We've never had to wait long They are kept very clean in great condition and the aircon is refreshing There are change booths on hand to change your money if you are short of coins to feed into the ticketing machine It's all very efficient

result.opinion: Trains are kept very clean in great condition

title: fastest way to get around
review: with the heavy traffic in thailand it is best to take the skytrain to save time very affordable clean and safe it gets you to your destination in no time most malls connect to skytrain station if you want to see bangkok hasslefree take the bts skytrain

result.opinion: Clean and safe
Very affordable, clean, and safe. Gets you to your destination in no time.

title: Covenient but relatively expensive compared to taxi fares especially if you are travelling with family
review: Fast and convenient But can cost more than taxi fare if you are travelling with family members Great if you are travelling alone but better take taxi or tuk tuk if you are travelling with family

result.opinion: Fast and convenient
No opinion is expressed about facilities in this review.

title: Fast and reliable
review: it's the best way to travel in BKK during peak time fast enough to reach your destination in no time i used BTS couple of times it was clean neat but a bit crowded

result.opinion: It's fast and convenient.
It was clean and neat.

title: Beat the Nasty Traffic
review: BKK BTS is highly accessible and connects to major landmarks and shopping centre  Frequency is very good with average waiting time less than 4 mins  Wise to invest in the prepaid card  Rabbit Card which allows top up value to beat the long queues at the station to purchase single trips

result.opinion: BKK BTS is highly accessible

title: Beat the traffic
review: Everyone knows that the traffic in Bangkok is horrendous Using the BTS skytrain will shave hours of travel time  in some cases  daily

result.opinion: The BTS skytrain is convenient for saving travel time.

title: Great way to get around
review: The sky train is very easy to use It is modern and clean and fast Expect a crowd and blaring whistles by the security keeping people from standing too close to the railway

result.opinion: The sky train is modern and clean

title: Good
review: Everything in Thailand was good for me We were so happy when we were on skytrain can see everything good view kind people fast speed Good for me

result.opinion: Skytrain was fast and convenient

title: The best transport in Bangkok
review: Forget taxis or tuk tuks Skytrain is by far the best way to travel around Bangkok No traffic guaranteed Comfortable trains and nicely air conditioned And you get to see Bangkok from a different perspective

result.opinion: Skytrain is by far the best way to travel around Bangkok
Skytrain is a safe way to travel around Bangkok.

title: A good system but is limited
review: I think the Skytrain is a great way to get around Bangkok but it is limited on where you can go and how far  Fortunately my hotel from the airport was on the route but to go from Stadium station to the Grand Palace or Wat Pho is a tuk tuk ride

result.opinion: The Skytrain is a great way to get around Bangkok

title: Best way to travel in BKK
review: If you are in BKK always chose the BTS over taxis because Bangkok traffic can easily depress you

result.opinion: The BTS is a safe way to travel in Bangkok.

title: Avoid peak hours
review: The sky train offers a very good transport alternative to the busy Bangkok traffic Just make sure to avoid peak hours that is not so pleasant to travel

result.opinion: Offers a very good transport alternative to the busy Bangkok traffic

title: Check where you're going, and take the Skytrain to the nearest point, if possible!
review: I found this a cheap and convenient way to get around Bangkok  For a westerner it's easy to follow  I always did a quick Google Maps check found the local station and planned my route around that  The aircon is such a relief during those hot sweaty Bangkok days and nights

result.opinion: Cheap and convenient way to get around

title: Very easy and convenient way to get around!
review: We never had to wait too long for the trains to arrive and places such as major shopping malls are just steps away from the exits of the station It could get really crowded at peak hours but still bearable as the next train arrives within a short amount of time

result.opinion: Trains arrive frequently and shopping malls are conveniently located.

title: Quick and Easy
review: A quick and easy way to get around town once you have mastered the ticketing A day pass is probably easier (can be purchased at the ticket counters)

result.opinion: A quick and easy way to get around town once you have mastered the ticketing

title: Modern Convenience
review: The Skytrain is a wonderfully clean mass transit railway which is simple and cheap to use  It provides access to the main tourist shopping districts in Siam as well as Silom and Sukhumvit Roads and provides interchanges to other mass transit lines and ferries on the river Its modern look and feel provides the visitor with welcome relief from the Bangkok heat in air conditioned carriages and as it is above ground gives wonderful views across the city  Any visitor to Bangkok is sure to come into contact with the Skytrain during their stay

result.opinion: The Skytrain is a wonderfully clean mass transit railway

title: The ONLY way to get around Bangkok
review: Due to the traffic congestion here the only way to get around Bangkok is either by SkyTrain (or the underground MRT) Take my advice (4year "farong" resident here) Don't take a cab  you'll just sit in traffic for hours   The other way to get around is by motorcycle which you can ride on the back with a local driver (they're the guys in bright colored vests so you can easily ID them) One word of caution they only pick you up at "mototaxi" stands   But back to the BTS Sky Train it's a great system with clean convenient and safe trains and access to many of the best destinations in town

title: Sky train
review: I love the sky train it's easy clean & easy to use unlike Londons underground tubes that are very confusing This is one straight line with ac

result.opinion: I love the sky train it's easy clean
Love the sky train, easy, clean, easy to use

title: Great way to get around BKK.
review: This is not an attraction but rather a public transit system If you are in the central part of BKK forget spending time in traffic jump on the skytrain (BTS) and subway (MRT) Absolutely the easiest way to get around Very reliable clean and safe If you are in BKK for several days or more buy a prepaid card which you can top off when needed This will save time buying one way tickets in the ticket queue Please know that although the BTS and MRT interconnect they use 2 different ticket systems Payment cards can be purchased for each

result.opinion: Absolutely the easiest way to get around. Very reliable, clean and safe.
Absolutely the easiest way to get around Very reliable clean and safe

title: clean and efficient
review: I catch the Bangkok BTS Skytrain regularily when I am in  Bangkok Usually I stay in accommodation near Asok Nana or Ploen Chit BTS stations I usually go to MBK Chidtlom Central Dept store or Siam to go to Paragon for shopping The BTS runs around every 3 minutes and is spotlessly clean and efficient Costs vary from where you want to go but for 1 or 2 people is great value for shorter distances More than 2 people probably a taxi in non peak times is better value

result.opinion: Spotlessly clean

title: transportation to shop at MBK
review: This was a great experience  The skytrain was an awesome experience  Took us straight to MBK covered walkway and  Siam Center

result.opinion: Great experience, awesome experience, straight to MBK covered walkway and Siam Center

title: Business and Pleasure
review: Best way to Travel in and around Bangkok Clean Efficient Services with Helpful Staff so easy once you know your whereabouts The Sukumvit Line Great for Shoppers  Walk off at the Emporium or Robinson's Center  or Queens Park  with Opposite Robbin Hood Pub and Londoner Pubs and Villa Market Magic to Travel Past the Horse Race Track Silom Line down to Pa pong road Night Market or head up to Morchet Depot and Chatachuk Open Huge Market just few Bahts stations have Express Thai Food or Hot dogs and Drinks Explore and Have the Fun Sky Train Value for Money and Cherry smiling Staff

result.opinion: Clean Efficient Services
Helpful Staff

title: Sky
review: I live in Bkk and will say that both sky and underground are fantastic Both very easy to use and both very reliable My only suggestion is that they may think of making one card to use on both Do buy a day or a longer time card that you can buy at the ever helpful kiosk It will help as sometimes quues can be rather long Enjoy Bkk is an absolute amazing place

result.opinion: Fantastic, easy to use, reliable.

title: Not so much "attraction" as much as "transportation
review: The skytrain will get you everywhere you need to go in Bangkok Well when paired with busses and those are a little bit more complex but someone will point you in the right direction ) The only complain is that the skytrains are INCREDIBLY over airconditioned so if you have a longer ride ahead of you you might want a light sweater in your bag (as counterintuitive as that seems on a 95degree day)  Entrance to the sky train is organized you will need to get into line But when the passengers depart just keep walking and scooching in You'll be amazed how many people can fit onto this train It won't be pretty but if its rushhour there is no point in waiting for the next train because it will be just as packed If you have luggagehave fun  The booth at every station is only for change for larger bills You will need to purchase your fare card from the automated machine This is much easier than it may seem Don't be intimidated its actually easier than trying to explain where you want to go in Thai  It isn't uncommon for you to be stopped to check your bags or be asked to throw away any open drink containers Don't be surprised

title: The easiest way to get around
review: The prices are very cheap but it can also be very crowded at peak times As you travel between stations you can see the gridlock on the roads as your journey continues You can swap between different lines If you do this remember to buy your ticket at the ticket office rather than the machines The diagrams are easy to follow with stations having a letternumber disignation as well as a sometime difficult to pronounce name Although it gets crowded the people que to get on after the passengers disembark  not like a mass scrum in the UK

result.opinion: Crowded at peak times Easy to follow diagrams People queue to get on after passengers disembark

title: Old train system but reliable.
review: Old train system but reliable No escalator only stairs to the platforms lol Ticketing only accept coins u can change at the manned counter & machine do issue change unlike some subway in USA states

result.opinion: Reliable

title: Safe N Easy Conveyance
review: Itz very safe n easy to catch n move in I dont remember the exact line which it was but I think it was Siam line with light green color and we travelled towards MBK the amazingly big mall

result.opinion: Very safe

title: skytrain : the perfect way to get from one place to another
review: Bangkok's skytrain is the perfect and fastest way to get from one place to another The skytrain and metro are clean fast and have a high frequency It is an optimal way to get from outside Bangkok to the hot spots at Sukhumvit No trafic jams no parking problems Best to choose an hotel nearby a metro or skytrain station If your hotel is not nearby you can also take a motorbike taxi at the exit of the skytrainor metrostation and for 20 bath they bring at your hotel The skytain or metro is a cheap transportsystem Average ticketprice is 35 bath

result.opinion: The skytrain and metro are clean, fast, and have a high frequency.

title: A very good service
review: Very efficient service provided by the Skytrain An affordable way to get around Stations are well placed The people who work there are friendly and always ready to advise on information when you ask for it

result.opinion: The people who work there are friendly and always ready to advise on information when you ask for it
Very efficient service, affordable, well placed stations, friendly staff

title: A easy way to travel in bangkok
review: You need to have small coins to use the machine to buy tickets The drive is very cheap Thr frequency of the trains is very good

result.opinion: The frequency of the trains is very good

title: SY TRAIN
review: When in Bangkok this is the only way too travel the Skytrain is quick clean and not expensive I travel on this train every day when in Bangkok it is safe stops at all the right places and has full security at every station You will have no problems with this mode of transport

result.opinion: Safe and has full security at every station
The Skytrain is quick, clean, and not expensive.

title: Great way to get around
review: We used this and the metro the entire time to get around while in Bangkok We really enjoyed it and it made us feel part of the local community while we were there It takes you everywhere and very easy to understand and to purchase tickets as well We stayed a little out of the city by using the trains meant we were in the action in a matter of minutes  To get to the Grand palace though we had to get onto a bus as well which was even cheaper at only 6baht   One of the best ways to get around Bangkok

result.opinion: We really enjoyed it and it made us feel part of the local community while we were there

title: Convenient and Reliavble
review: Easy to navigate around the city The website provides a lot of information eg fare schedule travel duration  Very good for planning

result.opinion: Easy to navigate around the city Website provides a lot of information eg fare schedule travel duration Very good for planning

title: excellent transport in bkk
review: excellent transport facilities and having a quick and easier access in bangkok basically have BTS and AIRPORT LINK have a very good access to all parts of bangkok and suvernaboom airport as well  very nice facilities

result.opinion: Excellent transport facilities and having a quick and easier access in Bangkok.
Excellent transport facilities and quick, easy access in Bangkok.

title: well connected
review: well connected for almost all the city locations Denomination coins are well provided in the stations which is very useful

result.opinion: Well connected for almost all the city locations Denomination coins are well provided in the stations which is very useful
Well connected for almost all the city locations, Denomination coins are well provided in the stations which is very useful

title: To get quick somewhere else
review: The skytrain in Bangkok is the fastest way to travel in this city Take a day card and you can travel unlimited If you travel by taxi there is a big chance you get in a huge trafic jam Once we moved 25 meter in 45 minutes  Only when you go outside the skytrain airia you best can travel to the closest station and take then a taxi When you come back to the centre do this again

result.opinion: Skytrain is the fastest way to travel Take a day card for unlimited travel Traffic jams are common in taxis Travel outside the skytrain airia to the closest station and take a taxi Travel back to the centre using the same method

title: Bangkok trains
review: Easy to understand though you have to watch out for both the Thai name and the station number  Cheap and realiable

result.opinion: Easy to understand though you have to watch out for both the Thai name and the station number  Cheap and realiable

title: Easy To Navigate
review: Cheap and easy to find your way around good maps provided I enjoyed using this to get about as there were some wonderful views of the city The Skytrain is very high up surprisingly enough They were very high tech there were TV screens for adverts in them barrier systems for tickets Lots of stairs so make sure you find stations with elevators if you have trouble with escalators or stairs

result.opinion: Cheap and easy to find your way around

title: Good & cheap means of travel in bangkok
review: The only issue is language barrier while traveling on public transport in bangkok Kindly carry route list for traveling

result.opinion: Language barrier while traveling on public transport in Bangkok

title: Always nice and cool
review: The Sky train in Bangkok in an excellent way to get around The stations are clean and safe and the trains run on time They are also well air conditioned which is advantageous in the Bangkok heat They are also very cheap by Western standards

title: It s always good and practicle to have a metro in a big city
review: The good news of Bkk is to have several lines of metro but the bad news  they are so crowded at rush hours they are so badly connected to each other that at intersections you must 90% of the time go out walk in the heat find the other line and pay again a new fee and no lines are going in the old quarters

title: Great Way to Travel
review: Once on the train I enjoyed traveling above the busy streets of Bangkok This system enables you to get quickly and safely from one destination to another  At peak times it can be very crowded and so do not expect to be able to find much clear space and certainly not a seat at these times I found locals tended to be looking intensely at their books or phones However from time to time I was given a seat At non peak times the ride is comfortable and one gets some good views above ground

result.opinion: The system enables you to get quickly and safely from one destination to another

title: Transport from airport to Bangkok centre
review: A quick and easy way to get to Bangkok from the airport Forget the taxis and buses this is way better

result.opinion: A quick and easy way to get to Bangkok from the airport

title: Convenient but expensive
review: I have been to BKK 4 times Skytrain is very convenient but the price is a little bit expensive It is a good choice when you want to take A1 to go to airport

result.opinion: Skytrain is very convenient

title: Easy to use
review: Best way to travel to get to some of Bangkok's tourist attractions Very well organized and you can avoid the Bangkok's heavy traffic

result.opinion: Very well organized and you can avoid the Bangkok's heavy traffic

title: Great way to explore the city and get from A to B
review: The Bangkok Skytrain or BTS is an impressive and efficient way to visit many parts of the city It is very well maintained and efficient It also offers nice views on the city on certain parts of the track If you are visiting as a tourist try and avoid the very busy rush hours

title: Great transportation!
review: Great way to travel through most of Bangkok  Watch out in the late afternoon and early evening  it gets CROWDED  Sardines have more room  But it is a reliable fast means of transportation  Much faster than taxi in some traffic  Very clean spotless even due to great rules like no eating or drinking on the train Easily connect to Metro or Express Boats

result.opinion: Very clean spotless even due to great rules like no eating or drinking on the train

title: Cool and Fast way to get around Bangkok
review: A ride on the skytrain is a fast and air conditioned wayt to get around Bangkok and also see some of the sights without being caught in the worst traffic

result.opinion: A fast and air conditioned way to get around Bangkok
Fast and air conditioned way to get around Bangkok

title: Great system.
review: The Sky Train system is excellent value for money and is such an easy way of getting round Bangkok Like any city city it does get busier in the rush hours but highly recommended

result.opinion: Excellent value for money and easy way of getting around Bangkok
Excellent value for money

title: Beat the Bangkok traffic!!
review: Convenient and easy to use runs frequently and beats the rush on the streets Difficult if you have a pushchair but otherwise the best way to get around

result.opinion: Convenient and easy to use

title: Better than most other options
review: Be prepared for a lot of people and a hot ride if you travel in the morning or after work Other than that it is good It does not take you all over the city but you canshould use it to get halfway there  avoiding traffic jams

title: On time & good alternative
review: We used the speed train from MBK to catch a river ferry reasonable price and bang on time did not have to waste time in traffic

result.opinion: Reasonable price and bang on time

title: Convenient
review: Save time but you better either buy rabbit card if you're a heavy user or prepare lots of coins for there are always long queue for change especially in major stations such as Siam and tourist area like Mo Chit (Chatuchak Weekend Market)

result.opinion: The review does not express an opinion on safety.
Long queue for change, especially in major stations and tourist areas

title: Rabbit Passes are great
review: If you are a regular visitor to Bangkok it's worth investing on Rabbit Pass It only deducts the trips you make and you can just top it up with so called "carrots" They last for about 2 years

result.opinion: It's convenient because it only deducts for trips made and can be topped up.

title: Cheap and easy to use
review: A great way to get around BKK Air conditioned and slick Living in Indonesia I miss the ability to hop on off public transport The service is also incredibly cheap Full day pass 140 bahtabout 26 GBP Has made me more prone to go travel around BKK

result.opinion: A great way to get around BKK Air conditioned and slick Living in Indonesia I miss the ability to hop on off public transport
The service is also incredibly cheap Full day pass 140 bahtabout 26 GBP Has made me more prone to go travel around BKK

title: Brilliant if it goes where you want to
review: Highly recommended We found it cheap clean fast and easy to use At both stations where we caught trains there were plenty of staff who helped us out one even took us to the machine and walked us through buying a ticket (which was unnecessary as we found the ticketing system simple to understand) It is a little odd not be able to buy tickets from the manned ticket counter but they're happy to change baht notes into coins for the machines

result.opinion: Found it clean
Staff were very helpful and friendly.
Found it cheap, clean, fast and easy to use.

title: Convenience
review: Best way to travel in Bangkok in comfort and avoiding the traffic The cost of travel is reasonable and most important it is time saving

result.opinion: Time saving

title: convenient
review: fast but i was not very clean we did feel safe how ever it was nice to look out and watch the city go by but its not the cheapest option around

result.opinion: We did feel safe

title: Easy to use as a tourist
review: So easy to navigate and very cheap to use  Go between the skytrain and metro easily   Reliable on time and frequent

result.opinion: So easy to navigate and very cheap to use
Reliable on time and frequent

title: Best of transportation
review: I like it  Very fast comfortable and cheap  I use BTS constantlywhen live in Bangkok Strongly recommended to all travelers

result.opinion: Very fast, comfortable, and cheap

title: Fastest and cheapest way to city from airport
review: Amazing airport link that took under 30 minutes to get from airport to center of city (only 4 minute walk to my hotel) for only 45 baht

result.opinion: Amazing airport link that took under 30 minutes to get from airport to center of city (only 4 minute walk to my hotel) for only 45 baht
Amazing airport link that took under 30 minutes to get from airport to center of city (only 4 minute walk to my hotel) for only 45 baht

title: The only way to travel fast.
review: Living on sukhumvit this really is the only way to get around fast As I been on the skytrain almost daily for the past 3 years now there has been delays no more than twice Can be super crowded at peak hours Just wait for the next train they come within minutes Never have to wait more than 5 10 min even if you don't get on the first train I would recommend everyone to get a "Rabbit" card Pre paid tickets and also work as payment in many shops Will save you time at the station even if you are just here for a few days  Some stations are of course more busy than others Asoke is really crowded at peak hours as it connects to the underground Mrt train But I can't imagine how it used to be too travel the city before it was built Unfortunately the two lines only cover so much of the city Mrt does extend the reach but menu places still require you to take taxi or bus to get to

result.opinion: The skytrain is convenient for getting around quickly.

title: Modern Urban Rail Transportation
review: I was so shocked when I first ride on the Skytrain   It was punctual clean and fast Skytrain really made living in Bangkok convenient as it helps people to travel around without being stuck in Bangkok's notorious traffic jam

result.opinion: Shocked by the punctuality, cleanliness, and speed.
Shocked by the punctuality

title: Best way to get from Pratinum to the airport.
review: The first time we used this train was when it first opened and was still in a trial period so cost us nothing to use It was fast and efficient then and I am pleased to say that after 5 years nothing has changed other than we now have to pay to use it It's very inexpensive to use though and is a much more enjoyable trip than sitting in a taxi in the traffic

title: Quick & easy transport
review: Excellent & fast way of  getting into town Cheaper than taxi THB45 from the airport to the city around AUD200 per person Definitely worth it

result.opinion: Excellent & fast way of getting into town

title: Quick and easy access to many parts of the city
review: Pleasantly airconditioned and clean Only crowded during rush hour but even then it isn't wall to wall people

result.opinion: Pleasantly airconditioned and clean
Pleasantly airconditioned and clean

title: Easy to deal with
review: cheap and efficient maps are easy to follow and the stops light up on the map in the carriage so you cannot lose track of where you are Staff in the booths are happy to tell you the fare and provide change so you can purchase the correct ticket from the machines

result.opinion: Staff in the booths are happy to tell you the fare and provide change.

title: Efficient and fast
review: Easy on and off air conditioned and easy to purchase passes whether that be a onemonth pass day pass or per use ticket  No better way to escape Bangkok traffic than to hop on the BTS Skytrain and zip off to where you need to be

result.opinion: Easy on and off, air conditioned, and easy to purchase passes

title: Best way to get around Bangkok
review: Air conditioned efficient regular clean and cheap (a day ticket is about £23) That is all you need to know really

result.opinion: Regular clean
Air conditioned efficient regular clean and cheap

title: Great way to get around
review: The train system was very easy to understand and follow It doesn't go everywhere but it goes to main areas for shopping and such It is cheap but make sure you have plenty of coins as the ticket machines only take coins There is an office to give coins if needed They offer day passes if you will be taking it a lot

result.opinion: Easy to understand and follow, goes to main areas, cheap, day passes available.
